## Overview

::: {.header-text} 
::: {.content-container}
::: {.header-block}
<br/>

Welcome to **Visual Analytics**. In this site, you will find a showcase of the exercises I have done for the SMU MITB course <a href="https://chockwk-visual-analytics.netlify.app/">ISSS608 Visual Analytics</a> taught by Prof Kam Tin Seong.

The learning objective is to understand the basic concepts, theories and methodologies of visual analytics, analyse data using appropriate visual thinking and visual analytics techniques, and implement cutting-edge visual analytics system for decision making.
